segments.text: How long have we had the A3 printer in the sales department ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Just over a year I think . Why , what's the problem ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm not sure but there seems to be something wrong with it . Is it still under guarantee ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think the guarantee's just run out . Let me check . Oh , it's OK . We took out an extended warranty , it runs until next March .
segments.speaker: S2
